title: Just My Luck...
body:
So the sale recently ended, where chromas where available for BE as well as RP.
And after it ends I finally get enough OE to unlock my Surprise Party Amumu skin shard, which has one of the best chroma ranges available.
And because they've just been on sale, we won't see BE chromas for another 6 months or more.

FUCK!
Why do you hate me Rito? What did I do to deserve this?
